languages.text: "Это было бы диво! Никогда сглаз настоящий не видел, будет, что племяшке рассказать".
"That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."
languages.original_text: "Это было бы диво! Никогда сглаз настоящий не видел, будет, что племяшке рассказать".

traits.locale_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."
"That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

"That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

languages.text: "Das wäre ein Anblick Ich habe noch nie einen echten Fluch gesehen. Meine Nichte wäre begeistert, alles darüber zu erfahren."
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

traits.locale_text: "Das wäre ein Anblick" Ich habe noch nie einen echten Fluch gesehen. Meine Nichte wäre begeistert, alles darüber zu erfahren."

languages.text: « Je serais curieux de voir ça ! Je n'ai encore jamais vu de véritable malédiction. Ma nièce serait ravie d'en savoir plus à ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

traits.locale_text: « Je serais curieux de voir ça ! Je n'ai encore jamais vu de véritable malédiction. Ma nièce serait ravie d'en savoir plus à ce sujet. »

languages.text: «¡Pues sería todo un espectáculo! Nunca he visto una maldición de verdad. A mi sobrina le encantaría que se lo contase».
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

traits.locale_text: «¡Pues sería todo un espectáculo! Nunca he visto una maldición de verdad. A mi sobrina le encantaría que se lo contase».

languages.text: 「それは見ものですね！本物の呪いなんて見たことがありません。姪が聞いたら大喜びすることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

traits.locale_text: 「それは見ものですね！本物の呪いなんて見たことがありません。姪が聞いたら大喜びすることでしょう」

languages.text: “那可太棒了！我还从来没亲眼见过诅咒呢。要是我侄女听说的话，估计她得兴奋坏了。”
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."

traits.locale_text: “那可太棒了！我还从来没亲眼见过诅咒呢。要是我侄女听说的话，估计她得兴奋坏了。”

languages.text: "Müthiş bir manzara olurdu! Daha önce hiç gerçek bir lanet görmedim. Yeğenim, anlatacaklarımı ayıla bayıla dinler."
languages.original_text: "That would be a sight! I've never seen a real curse before. My niece would be thrilled to hear all about it."
